about_the_game: In the Garden Designer Demo, you take on various tasks, from mowing lawns to designing and crafting beautiful gardens. You can even construct a structure next to one of your garden creations.
detailed_description: In the Garden Designer Demo, you take on various tasks, from mowing lawns to designing and crafting beautiful gardens. You can even construct a structure next to one of your garden creations.
name: Garden Designer Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit versions only)
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 7600 or Intel Core i5-13400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 22 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit versions only)
  • Processor: Ryzen 7 - 7700, Intel Core i7-13770 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 22 GB available space

short_description: In the Garden Designer Demo, you take on various tasks, from mowing lawns to designing and crafting beautiful gardens. You can even construct a structure next to one of your garden creations.
supported_languages: Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
